description:
Free OpenSource .Net Wrapper around un4seen Bass and most of its addons.
This project is currently in development.
You can contribute to it on GitHub.

Samples available on GitHub Repository

The Library is compiled for AnyCPU.
But the Bass dlls need to be checked for x64 or x86.
Put the Bass dlls in the same folder as ManagedBass.dll.
ManagedBass does not need to be licensed for Commercial use, but bass and many of the addons have to be.
Check the below website for more details
Bass dlls are available at http://www.un4seen.com/bass
Bass and its Addons are trademarks of their respective owners.
releaseNotes:
* Targeted to work with Mono
* Works with Xamarin.Android (may also work on Linux)
* A Bit More XML Documentation

Wrapped BassDSD, BassHLS

BassMidi
---------------------
* Rename StreamSetFontsEx to StreamSetFonts (overload)
* Rename FontInitUser to FontInit (overload)
* Rename FontPack(int,string,BassFlags) to FontUnpack (Sorry for the careless mistake I had done)
* Added InGetDeviceInfo(int) (overload)
* Added InDeviceCount
* Rename enum MidiEventSequence to MidiEventType
* InInit() defaults IntPtr user
* Complete rewrite of struct MidiEvent
* Added (int length = 0) parameter to StreamEvents()
* Created CreateStream() float[], short[] and int[] overloads
* Fixed CreateStream() FileProcedures overload

BassMix
---------------------
* Added MixerAddChannel(int,int,BassFlags,long,long) (overload)
* ChannelSetSync uses SyncFlags for Sync type
* Added delegate SyncProcedureEx
* ChannelSetSync SyncProcedureEx overload
* Rename ResetSplitStream() to SplitStreamReset()
* Added ChannelGetLevel (Ex overload)

BassEnc
---------------------
* Added enum EncodeServer
* Changed ServerInit() to use enum EncodeServer

BassWasapi
---------------------
* Added GetLevel (Ex overload)
* Modified enum WasapiNotificationType

BassWma
---------------------
* Added CreateStream (FileProcedures overload)
* Added CreateStream (Auth overloads)
* Added int[] EncodeGetRates()
* Added GetTags()
summary: Free OpenSource .Net Wrapper for Un4seen Bass.
title: ManagedBass
